Articles.Content: I had a direct entry from a Minmus return, and I set my periapsis to 20 km, which got me safely to the ground, but none of my ablator was used up, and no reentry effects happened. I have reentry heating on 100% and aerodynamic fx on full, so what's going on?
I am experiencing the same issues on the 1.0.4 Linux 64-bit build, what mods are you using? Happens with both saved and new games in career and sandbox mode.
